desc:
• Developed a comprehensive language learning web application utilizing Reactjs for frontend and Nodejs, and Expressjs for backend
  • Employed ffmpeg to extract 10-sec frame from a video and transcribed it to text using Whisper OpenAI NLP model with 96% accuracy
  • Utilized nltk to dynamically assign grammatical tags to each word, and presented in a tabular format within 5-8 sec model running time
  • Integrated dictionaryapi, showcasing comprehensive word information in modal interface and automated the project through .bat file

• Enhanced the visa service website by troubleshooting issues and elevating user experience utilizing PHP for the backend development
  • Improved the website lighthouse performance by 3%, augmenting accessibility by 1%, and SEO ranking by 2%, fostering online visibility
  • Executed seamless deployment of the website via FileZilla tool, leveraging Apache server for reliable hosting with uninterrupted access

• Conducted a comprehensive research on diverse startups, formulating brochures and pitch decks, and analyzed various funding rounds
  • Spearheaded collaboration with 6 Entrepreneurship Cells from various colleges and arranged discussion meetings with emerging startups
